page.title: 08RECREATION-URDO
page.content: RECREATION_URDD _______________ The "URDD" is the Welsh league of youth and is an organisation that gives us an opportunity to visit camp at GLAN LLYN near BALA.We can join the URDD at school and we meet after school to take part in various activities.The things we do include country dancing,orienteering,treasure hunts,film shows, gymnastics,quiz,discos,drama,talks and many more. Every year we have the NATIONAL EISTEDDFOD when the youth of Wales get together to compete at dancing,singing,recitation,drama,art&c raft etc.The EISTEDDFOD will be visiting Bethesda in 1986 and we have already collected about Â£50,000 to stage it.There will be 1000's of children here then.
